author: eptwts
text:
PARTNERSHIP OPPORTUNITY 

need a partner who can do the following things:

- build & optimize funnels
- set up sales pages
- manage email campaigns

i manage a large network of influencers & i need someone who can help me manage their offers & coordinate launches

please only DM or reply if you have extensive experience in the bulletpoints above

if you're not interested, i'd appreciate a RT/reply to boost the tweet, ty
